messages.title: It’s Dennis v Conservative
messages.content: Only Dennis can beat the Conservatives. Voting Labour and Green Party here just helps the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Lib Dems would borrow £70bn less than Labour and £50bn less than the Tories. Introduce measures to tackle tax evasion so that everyone pays their fair share.

mentions.candidate: Dennis Wharton says: "It’s vital we eliminate the deficit and keep Britain’s economy growing. This must not be at the price of ideological cuts to public services the Tories want."
mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s Dennis v Conservative - Only Dennis can beat the Conservatives. Voting Labour and Green Party here just helps the Conservatives.

issues.economy: Dennis Wharton says: "It’s vital we eliminate the deficit and keep Britain’s economy growing. This must not be at the price of ideological cuts to public services the Tories want."
issues.health: Clearly set out how the Lib Dems have the extra £8bn our NHS needs by 2020.

housing.content: Lib Dems policies would stop scrapping help with housing costs for young people.

images.caption: Dennis Wharton with supporters holding campaign signs.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet headlines 'Winning Here!' implying a strong local presence or electoral success for the Liberal Democrats.
